question: I have had severe chest pain two months after two stent placements. I live in a foreign country where medical help is not so readily available. I had the heart attack while visiting family in Texas . I have no Diabetes but did have hi cholostrol and was a smoker. Should I return to the US or is this normal. This severe pain comes and goes, I may have it for two or three days and then it goes away and I have it again . Thanks and God Bless
title: chronic chest pain 6 months after two stent placements
